history.content:
Berkeley Investment Group will be working with JMI Equity to host the first ever "Career in Growth Equity" Event series next week. This is a great opportunity for students interested in Growth Equity and Software Investing to learn more and be connected directly with JMI professionals. 
JMI Equity is a growth equity firm focused on investing in leading software companies. Founded in 1992, JMI has invested in 150 businesses in its target markets, successfully completed over 100 exits, and raised more than $6 billion of committed capital. JMI partners with exceptional management teams to help build their companies into industry leaders. You can find more information on them here.
There are two events next week: 
  • JMI will be having a virtual informational session next Tuesday 9/14. This event will include an introduction to private / growth equity as an asset class, while providing insight into a career in growth equity, with a particular focus on what it’s like working as an Analyst at a growth equity firm. There will also be networking breakout rooms representatives from JMI. If you're interested, please register here or at https://tinyurl.com/introjmi
  • JMI will also be hosting coffee chats for select students following the informational session. Select students will be chosen for in-person, informal coffee chats with JMI investment professionals to learn more about JMI and the Analyst role. More details will be provided at the virtual event on Sept. 14th.
JMI is also currently recruiting for their 2022 Full Time Growth Equity Analyst class. Applications are due October 31st and more details can be found on the handshake posting here.
A_Career_in_Growth_Equity.pdf
history.subject: JMI Equity Recruiting Events & 2022 Full Time Details
